kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (135.0.7049.95) detected in PATH at chromedriver.EXE might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (136.0.7103.48); currently, chromedriver 136.0.7103.92 is recommended for chrome 136.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

test.name: Création et vérifications d’un ticket sur ServiceNow

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Sleep

kw.name: Rechercher Et Selectionner Creer TCO
kw.msg: [1/30] Tentative d’accès à la barre de recherche contextuelle... Texte 'Créer Tco' saisi dans la barre contextuelle. [1/30] Tentative de clic sur le favori 'Créer Tco'... [2/30] Tentative de clic sur le favori 'Créer Tco'... Clic sur 'Créer Tco' dans les favoris réussi.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Remplir Champs Obligatoires Tco
kw.msg: Attente du champ catégorie dans le DOM... Attente du champ sous-catégorie dans le DOM... Tous les champs obligatoires ont été remplis.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

test.doc: Simule la création d’un ticket LTT ServiceNow et vérifie l’ensemble des éléments requis.

errors.msg: The chromedriver version (135.0.7049.95) detected in PATH at chromedriver.EXE might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (136.0.7103.48); currently, chromedriver 136.0.7103.92 is recommended for chrome 136.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
